artist: Artist: After Adriaen Van de Venne; Printer: Daniel Van den Bremden
description: two images mounted on one sheet both from "Tarfereel Van de Belacchende Werelt"; a) crowd of people in street; richly dressed man in center with medical instrument in hand pointed at eye of pooly dressed man with long beard leaning on a crutch; richly dressed woman seated behind holding/supporting poor man b) two figures in room with canopied bed; woman seated with feet up at fire; man washing floor; table set for meal in center background; painting of ships on wall above table
inscription:
Inscription

in plate LLCorner of (a) in black:[ AVVenne in/ DVBredeon fe]; in pencil: [181]
portfolio: From from "Tarfereel Van de Belacchende Werelt" pp. 99 and 109
title: untitled
